message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computational Linguistics): The paper focuses on developing a text-to-animation system that involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques to extract information from screenplays and simplify complex sentences. 
2. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper involves the development of an AI-based system that can generate animations from natural language text. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper may involve the use of machine learning techniques to train the animation generation system. 
4. cs.CV (Computer Vision): The paper may involve the use of computer vision techniques to generate the video depicting the text. 
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The paper may involve the use of information retrieval techniques to map the extracted information to the system's knowledge base.
